attributes.action: Make the wearing of masks complusory in schools
attributes.additional_details: In classrooms across the UK many children are unable to maintain social distancing. Wearing a mask is compulsory in schools across the world and there is no good reason for it not to be in the UK. By reducing the transmission in this way , less children will have to self isolate and miss out on valuable learning time.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for students to wear face coverings in the classroom as well as in communal spaces.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make wearing face masks mandatory in secondary schools and colleges.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227

Mandatory for children aged 11 and above to wear face masks whilst at school.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331826

Make masks mandatory for primary school students and teachers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551102
